title.narrative: Multisectoral Water and Electricity Infrastructure Project

description.narrative: The proposed project development objective (PDO) is to: (a) increase access to water supply services in peri-urban areas of Bujumbura; (b) increase the reliability and quality of electricity services; (c) increase the quality and reliability of water supply services, with primary focus on Bujumbura; and (d) strengthen REGIDESO financial sustainability.

condition.narrative: Implementing Agency carry out jointly with IDA a Mid-Term Review
Implementing Agency to acquire and install a Financial Management System
Implementing Agency to appoint, not later than 6 months after Effectiveness Technical Auditors
Implementing Agency to have Performance Contract audited on annual basis
Recipient carry out Financial Restructuring of the Implementing Agency
Recipient shall, not later than 3 months after Effectiveness appoint external auditors
